summary: This is an email from August 26, 2019, regarding seating arrangements for an upcoming Epstein hearing. The Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) of FBI New York plans to attend, and the sender is coordinating with SDNY to reserve seating and inquiring if the recipient also plans to attend.

persons.name: ADIC FBI New York
persons.role: Assistant Director in Charge of FBI New York
persons.context: Plans to attend the Epstein hearing on August 27, 2019, and requires reserved seating arranged through SDNY.

events.title: Epstein Hearing
events.description: A court hearing related to the Jeffrey Epstein case, attended by the ADIC of FBI New York.

keyFacts: The Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) of FBI New York planned to attend an Epstein hearing scheduled for August 27, 2019.
Seating arrangements for the hearing were being coordinated with the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
The email was sent on August 26, 2019, indicating last-minute logistical planning for high-level law enforcement attendance.
